item.title: Trump says he'll impose 25% tariffs on all goods from Canada and Mexico, 10% on China on first day

item.title: Walmart dumps DEI programs amid conservative backlash: 'Biggest win yet'
item.description: Walmart will be cutting back its "diversity, equity and inclusion" programs and other forms of what conservatives deride as corporate wokeness.

item.title: Success of movie 'Reagan' shows Gipper's appeal continues decades later
